mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MOZZLE WHERE MOZZLE_NAME= #{mozzle_name}
SELECT MOZZLE_ID, MOZZLE_NAME, MOZZLE_INTRO, CREATE_DATE, IMAGE_ORIGIN, IMAGE_SAVED, CATEGORY_CODE, STATE FROM MOZZLE WHERE MOZZLE_ID= #{mozzle_id}

SELECT m.MOZZLE_ID MOZZLE_ID, m.MOZZLE_NAME MOZZLE_NAME, m.MOZZLE_INTRO MOZZLE_INTRO, m.CREATE_DATE CREATE_DATE, m.IMAGE_ORIGIN IMAGE_ORIGIN, m.IMAGE_SAVED IMAGE_SAVED, m.CATEGORY_CODE CATEGORY_CODE, m.STATE STATE, um.NICKNAME LEADER_NICKNAME FROM MOZZLE m LEFT JOIN USER_MOZZLE um ON m.MOZZLE_ID = um.MOZZLE_ID WHERE STATE = 'Y' AND um.AUTH_CODE = '1' AND um.USER_ID = #{user_id}

SELECT m.MOZZLE_ID MOZZLE_ID, m.MOZZLE_NAME MOZZLE_NAME, m.MOZZLE_INTRO MOZZLE_INTRO, m.CREATE_DATE CREATE_DATE, m.IMAGE_ORIGIN IMAGE_ORIGIN, m.IMAGE_SAVED IMAGE_SAVED, m.CATEGORY_CODE CATEGORY_CODE, m.STATE STATE, um.NICKNAME LEADER_NICKNAME FROM MOZZLE m LEFT JOIN USER_MOZZLE um ON m.MOZZLE_ID = um.MOZZLE_ID WHERE m.STATE = 'Y' AND um.AUTH_CODE = '1' ORDER BY m.CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT MOZZLE_ID, MOZZLE_NAME, MOZZLE_INTRO, CREATE_DATE, IMAGE_ORIGIN, IMAGE_SAVED, CATEGORY_CODE, STATE, COUNT(*) MEMBERCNT FROM (SELECT m.MOZZLE_ID MOZZLE_ID, m.MOZZLE_NAME MOZZLE_NAME, m.MOZZLE_INTRO MOZZLE_INTRO, m.CREATE_DATE CREATE_DATE, m.IMAGE_ORIGIN IMAGE_ORIGIN, m.IMAGE_SAVED IMAGE_SAVED, m.CATEGORY_CODE CATEGORY_CODE, m.STATE STATE FROM MOZZLE m RIGHT JOIN USER_MOZZLE um ON m.MOZZLE_ID = um.MOZZLE_ID WHERE um.AUTH_CODE IN ('1', '2')) GROUP BY MOZZLE_ID, MOZZLE_NAME, MOZZLE_INTRO, CREATE_DATE, IMAGE_ORIGIN, IMAGE_SAVED, CATEGORY_CODE, STATE ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM USER_MOZZLE WHERE AUTH_CODE IN ('1', '2')) WHERE MOZZLE_ID = #{mozzle_id} GROUP BY MOZZLE_ID
SELECT NICKNAME AS LEADER_NICKNAME FROM USER_MOZZLE WHERE MOZZLE_ID=#{mozzle_id} AND AUTH_CODE ='1'

SELECT MOZZLE_ID , MOZZLE_NAME, MOZZLE_INTRO, CREATE_DATE, IMAGE_ORIGIN, IMAGE_SAVED, CATEGORY_CODE FROM (SELECT MOZZLE_ID , MOZZLE_NAME, MOZZLE_INTRO, CREATE_DATE, IMAGE_ORIGIN, IMAGE_SAVED, CATEGORY_CODE FROM MOZZLE m WHERE STATE = 'Y' AND MOZZLE_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' UNION ALL SELECT MOZZLE_ID , MOZZLE_NAME, MOZZLE_INTRO, CREATE_DATE, IMAGE_ORIGIN, IMAGE_SAVED, CATEGORY_CODE FROM MOZZLE m WHERE STATE = 'Y' AND MOZZLE_INTRO LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' UNION ALL SELECT m.MOZZLE_ID, m.MOZZLE_NAME, m.MOZZLE_INTRO, m.CREATE_DATE, m.IMAGE_ORIGIN, m.IMAGE_SAVED, m.CATEGORY_CODE FROM MOZZLE m JOIN CATEGORY c ON m.CATEGORY_CODE = c.CATEGORY_CODE WHERE m.STATE = 'Y' AND CATEGORY_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%') GROUP BY MOZZLE_ID, MOZZLE_NAME, MOZZLE_INTRO, CREATE_DATE, IMAGE_ORIGIN, IMAGE_SAVED, CATEGORY_CODE ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC

SELECT m.MOZZLE_ID, m.MOZZLE_NAME, m.MOZZLE_INTRO, m.CREATE_DATE, m.IMAGE_ORIGIN, m.IMAGE_SAVED, m.CATEGORY_CODE FROM MOZZLE m FULL OUTER JOIN CATEGORY c ON m.CATEGORY_CODE = c.CATEGORY_CODE WHERE (m.MOZZLE_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR m.MOZZLE_INTRO LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR c.CATEGORY_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%') AND m.STATE = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
